thread.title: WATCH: Greg Gutfeld Calls Inauguration Protesters “Cowardly Thugs With Hygiene Issues”
thread.title_full: WATCH: Greg Gutfeld Calls Inauguration Protesters “Cowardly Thugs With Hygiene Issues”

author: Kim Smith
title: WATCH: Greg Gutfeld Calls Inauguration Protesters “Cowardly Thugs With Hygiene Issues”
text:
Gutfeld then explained that misplaced priorities made Democrats sore losers: 
“It’s not about you, but a country,” he said. 
He’s right. Democrats love to make everything about them, and their self-referential outlook landed them exactly where they are — out of power in the White House, both houses of Congress and the majority of state governments. Advertisement - story continues below 
Here’s Gutfeld: 
He nailed it. Those who protested against Trump’s presidency and created mayhem in the streets were nothing but cowardly thugs. Tearing things up and throwing a temper tantrum isn’t the mature way to deal with a loss, but the more we learn about Democrats, the less mature they seem. This is who they really are. 
Democrats claim they are fearful that Trump will somehow set this country back, yet all they do is throw hissy fits and destroy property when their candidate loses. Destruction of property and acting like deranged children is the way to set this country back. Advertisement - story continues below
